articles.description: Kotak Mahindra Bank Credit Card & Mobile Banking Curbs: Prime Minister Narendra Modi aims to export India's digital payments system worldwide, but faces obstacles as Indian banks struggle with outdated technology. Despite massive investments in tech to boost …
articles.content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi wants to export Indias digital payments system to the world. That plan now risks stumbling as clunky technology used by Indian lenders fails to keep up with his ambitions… [+4478 chars]

articles.author: Diana Olick
articles.title: This startup helps plants talk to farmers, reducing pesticides and agricultural waste - CNBC
articles.description: InnerPlant's technology uses fluorescents in the plants, so the leaves emit a signal when they are in distress.
articles.content:
What if plants could talk to farmers and tell them when they're distressed? That would not only help the plants but also reduce the amount of agricultural waste that threatens the planet's health.
